page.title: 14INTERCHANGE HOTEL
page.content:
This is situated just north of the { {M5}on the {A38}. It was started about eighteen months ago ,and a{farm house has been{converted}to make hotel rooms The owners have plenty of space to extend the hotel, but do not intend to so for some while .
It costs Â£33 to stay in a single room for a night,and Â£39.50 for a double room. It is cheaper at weekends. The cost of a evening meal is about Â£10 and{non-residents}can come in and use the restaurant.
The licence means that customers cannot use the bar unless they are staying at the hotel.
